name: Spacewar! (itch) (Joker Gaming from Game Gen)
description:
I made this game for the lesson on Game Gen and I'm really proud about myself when I made it.

This game is simple it's a 2 player game with 2 spaceships killing each other but there's no end screen the game is just for fun.

The controls are

Player 1 Rocket: A=turn left D=turn right W=accelerate F=shoot

Player 2 Rocket: Left arrow=turn left Right arrow=turn right Up arrow= accelerate Slash(/)=shoot

Music by Benjamin Tissot (also known as Bensound)

Link: Slow Motion | Royalty Free Music (bensound.com)
